name: ViruZ (itch) (Lerg Bwo)
description:
Dodge the immune system on the way to the brain

Controls:

WASD to move

Left click to shoot

R to restart at checkpoint

Hold  R to restart at the beginning

F10  to toggle fullscreen (executable)

Tip:

Try to hit multiple enemies everytime you shoot

Scoring:

You score at every checkpoint, based on your current size

Dying resets score to zero

shooting is -20 size

getting hit is -35 size

collectables give you +15

was meant for a little game jam i didnt have time for but i havent released anything this year so made sure to get this out anyway
